text:
Roland Banks deck only.

Uses (4 ammo).

[action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack (if there are 1 or more clues on your location, you get +3 [combat], instead). This attack deals +1 damage.
name: Roland's .38 Special

text:
Revelation - Put Cover Up into play in your threat area, with 3 clues on it.

[reaction] When you would discover 1 or more clues at your location: Discard that many clues from Cover Up instead.

Forced - When the game ends, if there are any clues on Cover Up: You suffer 1 mental trauma.
name: Cover Up

text:
Revelation - Put Hospital Debts into play in your threat area.

[fast action]: Move 1 resource from your resource pool to Hospital Debts. (Limit twice per round.)

Forced - When the game ends, if Hospital Debts has fewer than 6 resources on it: You earn 2 fewer experience for this scenario.
name: Hospital Debts

text:
"Skids" O'Toole deck only.

Fast. Play after your turn begins.

Until the end of the round, non-Elite enemies cannot attack you.
flavor: I ain't going to the pen a second time.
name: On the Lam

text: Revelation - Take 2 direct horror and remove all cards in your discard pile from the game.
flavor: I don't need them. I don't need anyone.
name: Abandoned and Alone

backText:
Deck size: 30.

Deckbuilding options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-5, Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-2, Neutral cards level 0-5.

Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): Daisy’s Tote Bag, The Necronomicon (John Dee Translation), 1 random basic weakness.
backFlavor: As a respected librarian at Miskatonic University, Daisy had always felt that books were the most important thing in her life. She explored in fiction what she abhorred in life: horror, violence, fear. Then, she stumbled across the John Dee translation of the Necronomicon. It was blasphemous, unholy, and too awful to be read. But given her studies in obscure and occult subjects, Daisy knew there was more truth than fiction within the book's pages. She began to wonder what other secrets the restricted collection of the Orne Library held...
text:
You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used on Tome [action] abilities.

[elder sign] effect: +0. If you succeed, draw 1 card for each Tome you control.
flavor: "I know of books so powerful, they can rewrite reality."
name: Daisy Walker

backText:
Deck size: 30.

Deckbuilding options: Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-5, Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-2, Neutral cards level 0-5.

Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): Wendy's Amulet, Abandoned and Alone, 1 random basic weakness.
backFlavor: Mama used to let Wendy play with her necklace when she was small. Mama would tell her stories, and Wendy would spin the necklace and watch as it glittered. Then, word came that her father had been lost at sea, and Mama started acting strange, drawing unusual symbols in chalk all over the house. They took Mama to the asylum, and Wendy went to the orphanage. Before they took her away, Mama gave her the necklace, to "protect her." Wendy stayed in the orphanage for several years before running away, deciding that she could take better care of herself on her own.
text:
[reaction] When you reveal a chaos token, choose and discard 1 card from your hand: Cancel that chaos token and return it to the bag. Reveal a new chaos token. (Limit once per test/ability.)

[elder sign] effect: +0. If Wendy's Amulet is in play, you automatically succeed instead.
name: Wendy Adams

text:
Daisy Walker deck only.

You have 2 additional hand slots, which can only be used to hold Tome assets.
name: Daisy's Tote Bag

text:
Place 1 doom on the current agenda. This effect may cause the current agenda to advance.

Forced - If Dark Memory is in your hand at the end of your turn, reveal it and take 2 horror.
flavor: No... not again!
name: Dark Memory

text:
Agnes Baker deck only.

[reaction] After you play a spell card: Draw 1 card.
flavor: The etchings on its surface change from day to day, and moving whenever I'm not looking.
name: Heirloom of Hyperborea

backText:
Deck size: 30.

Deckbuilding options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-5, Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-2, Neutral cards level 0-5.

Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): Roland's .38 Special, Cover Up, 1 random basic weakness.
backFlavor: Roland had always taken comfort in procedure and rules. As an agent in the Bureau, he was relieved to have guidelines to follow in any given situation. But lately, his Federal Agent's Handbook had been entirely unhelpful given the cases he'd been assigned. Try as he might, Roland could find no mention of what to do when confronted with strange creatures, gates through time and space, or magic spells. If he hadn't seen it with his own eyes, he would never have believed it... and there's no way his superiors would understand. Roland knew he would have to handle this one himself.
text:
[reaction] After you defeat an enemy: Discover 1 clue at your location. (Limit once per round.)

[elder sign] effect: +1 for each clue on your location.
flavor: Everything by the book: every "i" dotted, every "t" crossed. It has worked, until now.
name: Roland Banks

text:
Revelation - Put The Necronomicon into play in your threat area, with 3 horror on it. It cannot leave play while it has 1 or more horror on it.

Treat each [elder sign] you reveal on a chaos token as a [auto fail].

[action]: Move 1 horror from The Necronomicon to Daisy Walker. Then, if The Necronomicon has no horror on it, discard it.
name: The Necronomicon

text:
Wendy Adams deck only.

You may play the topmost event in your discard pile as if it were in your hand.

Forced - After you play an event: Place it on the bottom of your deck instead of in your discard pile.
name: Wendy's Amulet

backText:
Deck size: 30.

Deckbuilding options: Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-5, Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-2, Neutral cards level 0-5.

Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): Heirloom of Hyperborea, Dark Memory, 1 random basic weakness.
backFlavor: Agnes Baker may be just an unassuming waitress in this life, but in a previous life, in a time and age undreamed of in the modern world, she had been a powerful witch. It began when she found a strange artifact — a key of some kind — in a dusty collection of family belongings in her attic. When she touched it, the memories came flooding back, along with one word: "Hyperborea." The more she delved into the visions and memories of her former life, the stronger her powers grew... and the more frightened she became.
text:
[reaction] After 1 or more horror is placed on Agnes Baker: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location. (Limit once per phase.)

[elder sign] effect: +1 for each horror on Agnes Baker.
flavor: "I remember another life, one of sorcery and conquest."
name: Agnes Baker

backText:
Deck size: 30.

Deckbuilding options: Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-5, Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-2, Neutral cards level 0-5.

Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): On the Lam, Hospital Debts, 1 random basic weakness.
backFlavor: Skids hadn't planned on a life of crime. But sometimes doing the right thing means getting your hands dirty. The cops didn't care that Skids needed the money for his mother's operation. His mother died of her illness during the second year of his sentence. His cellmate, Brad Hollins, told him there were worse fates than death. He ranted and raved in a quiet voice every evening about the "Old Ones" and told Skids about bizzare adventures he'd had while dreaming. Skids didn't give it much thought until the night he woke to the sight of his cellmate bursting into flames. When Skids was finally released, he returned to Arkham, looking for answers.
text:
[fast action] During your turn, spend 2 resources: You may take an additional action this turn. (Limit once per turn.)

[elder sign] effect: +2. If you succeed, gain 2 resources.
flavor: "I didn't get out of the joint just to watch the world end."
name: "Skids" O'Toole

text:
Uses (4 ammo).

[action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage.
name: .45 Automatic

text:
[fast action] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.

[fast action] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.
name: Physical Training

text:
You get +1 [combat].

[fast action] Discard Beat Cop: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.
name: Beat Cop

text:
Uses (3 supplies). If First Aid has no supplies, discard it.

[action] Spend 1 supply: Heal 1 damage or horror from an investigator at your location.
name: First Aid

text: [action]: Fight. You get +1  for this attack. If the attacked enemy is the only enemy engaged with you, this attack deals +1 damage.
flavor: Cuts through vines, underbrush, and tentacles equally well.
name: Machete

text: [reaction] When an enemy attack deals damage to Guard Dog: Deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.
flavor: Fiercely loyal, these trained canines make for perfect companions.
name: Guard Dog

text:
Fast. Play after you defeat an enemy.

Discover 1 clue at your location.
flavor: Just as I suspected!
name: Evidence!

text:
Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location.

Cancel that attack.
name: Dodge

text: Choose either your location or a connecting location. Deal 3 damage to each enemy and to each investigator at the chosen location.
name: Dynamite Blast

text: If this skill test is successful during an attack, that attack deals +1 damage.
flavor: With a sickening smack, he struck the abomination over and over... until at last, it stopped moving.
name: Vicious Blow

text: Place 3 ammo tokens on a Firearm asset controlled by an investigator at your location.
flavor: I've never met a beast that could outsmart a bullet.
name: Extra Ammunition

text:
You get +1 [willpower].

[fast action] While an investigator at your location is taking his or her turn, discard Police Badge: That investigator may take 2 additional actions this turn.
name: Police Badge

text:
You get +1 [combat].

[fast action] Exhaust Beat Cop and deal 1 damage to it: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.
name: Beat Cop

text:
Uses (2 ammo).

[action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +3 [combat] for this attack. Instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 1 damage for each point you succeed by (to a minimum of 1, to a maximum of 5). If you fail and would damage another investigator, this attack deals 1 damage for each point you fail by (to a minimum of 1, to a maximum of 5).
name: Shotgun

text:
Fast.

You get +1 [intellect] while investigating.
flavor: A lens into a world unseen can reveal things you wish it hadn't.
name: Magnifying Glass

text: [action] Exhaust Old Book of Lore: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator searches the top 3 cards of his or her deck for a card, draws it, and shuffles the remaining cards into his or her deck.
name: Old Book of Lore

text: [reaction] After Research Librarian enters play: Search your deck for a Tome asset and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: "There have been problems at the Orne Library, as we both know, given poor Armitage's condition, and the other, unrelated... incident of a few years ago..."
name: Research Librarian

text:
You get +1 [intellect].

[reaction] After you successfully investigate: Gain 1 resource.
flavor: "While I truly believe that this nightmare is just a singular abomination, I must admit that I am exhilarated by the possibility that this is but one specimen of a new genus!"
name: Dr. Milan Christopher

text:
[fast action] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test.

[fast action] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.
name: Hyperawareness

text: [action] Choose an investigator at your location and test [intellect] (2). If you succeed, heal 1 damage from that investigator. If you fail, deal 1 damage to that investigator.
name: Medical Texts

text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.

Until the end of the round, you may use your [intellect] in place of your [combat] and [agility].
name: Mind over Matter

text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.

Discover 1 clue at your location.
name: Working a Hunch

text:
Attach to your location.

Non-Elite enemies cannot move into attached location.

Forced - When an investigator leaves attached location: Discard Barricade.
name: Barricade

text: If this skill test is successful while investigating a location, discover 1 additional clue at that location.
flavor: I knew I had seen this symbol before. I must warn the others before it is too late!
name: Deduction

text:
Fast.

You get +1 [intellect] while investigating.

[fast action] If there are no clues on your location: Return Magnifying Glass to your hand.
flavor: A lens into a world unseen can reveal things you wish it hadn't.
name: Magnifying Glass

text: [reaction] When a non-Elite enemy spawns at your location, discard Disc of Itzamna: Discard that enemy.
flavor: Do they fear it because of what it will do to them? Or, do they fear it because of what it will do to you?
name: Disc of Itzamna

text: [action] Exhaust Encyclopedia: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator gets +2 to a skill of your choice until the end of the phase.
flavor: It's supposed to be comprehensive, but the more I search through its pages, the more I realize we know nothing about the real truths of the cosmos.
name: Encyclopedia

text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.

Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator draws 3 cards.
name: Cryptic Research

text:
Fast.

[action]: Fight. If you succeed by 2 or more, this attack deals +1 damage.
name: Switchblade

text: [action] Exhaust Burglary: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, gain 3 resources.
name: Burglary

text: [reaction] After you evade an enemy, exhaust Pickpocketing: Draw 1 card.
name: Pickpocketing

text:
Uses (3 ammo).

[action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If you succeed by 2 or more, this attack deals +1 damage.
name: .41 Derringer

text: You may take an additional action during your turn.
flavor: "I was born in Mississippi. Louisiana just sounded better."
name: Leo De Luca

text:
[fast action] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.

[fast action] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.
name: Hard Knocks

text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.

Disengage from each enemy engaged with you and move to a revealed location with no enemies.
name: Elusive

text: Fight. This attack uses [agility] instead of [combat]. This attack deals +2 damage.
name: Backstab

text: Deal 2 damage to an exhausted enemy at your location.
name: Sneak Attack

text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.

If you succeed by 3 or more, return Opportunist to your hand after this test instead of discarding it.
name: Opportunist

text: You may take an additional action during your turn.
flavor: "I was born in Mississippi. Louisiana just sounded better."
name: Leo De Luca

text:
You get +1 [agility].

[action] Exhaust Cat Burglar: Disengage from each enemy engaged with you and move to a connecting location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
name: Cat Burglar

text:
Fast. Play after you reveal a chaos token with a negative modifier.

Switch that token's "–" to a "+".
name: Sure Gamble

text: Gain 10 resources.
flavor: "I win again! Sorry sugar, it's just not your night."
name: Hot Streak

text:
Uses (4 secrets).

[fast action] Exhaust Forbidden Knowledge and take 1 horror: Move 1 secret from Forbidden Knowledge to your resource pool, as a resource.
name: Forbidden Knowledge

text: You get +1 [willpower].
flavor: Whether focused through a mundane trinket or a mystical artifact, there is real power in faith all the same.
name: Holy Rosary

text:
Uses (4 charges).

[action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder thing], or [auto fail] symbol is revealed during this check, take 1 horror.
name: Shrivelling

text:
Uses (3 charges).

[action] Exhaust Scrying and spend 1 charge: Look at the top 3 cards of any investigator's deck or the encounter deck. Return them to the top of that deck in any order.
name: Scrying

text:
[fast action] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.

[fast action] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test.
name: Arcane Studies

text:
Forced - After Arcane Initiate enters play: Place 1 doom on it.

[fast action] Exhaust Arcane Initiate: Search the top 3 cards of your deck for a Spell card and draw it. Shuffle your deck.
name: Arcane Initiate

text: Draw the top card of the encounter deck. Then, discover 2 clues at your location.
flavor: "We live on a placid island of ignorance in the midst of black seas of infinity, and it was not meant that we should voyage far." H. P. Lovecraft, "The Call of Cthulhu"
name: Drawn to the Flame

text:
Fast. Play when you draw a non-weakness treachery card.

Cancel that card's revelation effect. Then, take 1 horror.
name: Ward of Protection

text: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to the enemy just evaded. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder thing], or [auto fail]symbol is revealed during this evasion attempt, lose 1 action this turn.
name: Blinding Light

text: If this skill test is successful, heal 1 horror.
flavor: Only by standing firm against the darkness can we live to see the light of another day.
name: Fearless

text:
Fast. Play after a phase begins.

Choose a non-Elite enemy at your location. Treat the chosen enemy's printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits) until the end of the phase.
name: Mind Wipe

text: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. If you succeed, deal 2 damage to the enemy just evaded. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder thing], or [auto fail]symbol is revealed during this evasion attempt, lose 1 action this turn and take 1 horror.
name: Blinding Light

text:
You have 1 additional arcane slot.

[action] Exhaust Book of Shadows: Add 1 charge to a Spell asset you control.
name: Book of Shadows

text:
Uses (4 charges). If Grotesque Statue has no charges, discard it.

[reaction] When you would reveal a chaos token, spend 1 charge: Reveal 2 chaos tokens instead of 1. Choose 1 of those tokens to resolve, and ignore the other.
name: Grotesque Statue

flavor: The coat was not the most fashionable choice, but it did feel warm and reassuring in its bulk.
name: Leather Coat

text: [reaction] After you successfully investigate by 2 or more, exhaust Scavenging: Choose an Item card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.
name: Scavenging

text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. If a [skull] or [auto fail] symbol is revealed during this attack, discard Baseball Bat after the attack resolves.
name: Baseball Bat

text: [reaction] After you fail a skill test, exhaust Rabbit's Foot: Draw 1 card.
flavor: They claimed it would bring me good luck. I wouldn't say that's true. But now I feel like it would be even worse luck to get rid of it.
name: Rabbit's Foot

text: [fast action] Discard Stray Cat: Automatically evade a non-Elite enemy at your location.
flavor: He never came if you called for him. It always seemed like he had his own agenda.
name: Stray Cat

text:
[fast action] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.

[fast action] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.
name: Dig Deep

text: Evade. Automatically evade all enemies at your location.
flavor: That should buy us some time.
name: Cunning Distraction

text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less while investigating.

Discover 2 clues in your location.
name: "Look what I found!"

text:
Fast. Play when you would fail a skill test.

Get +2 to your skill value for that test.
name: Lucky!

text: If this skill test is successful during an evasion attempt, the evading investigator may immediately disengage from each other enemy engaged with him or her, and may move to a connecting location.
name: Survival Instinct

text: [reaction] When an enemy attacks you, exhaust Aquinnah and deal 1 horror to her: Deal that enemy's damage to another enemy at your location, instead. (You still take horror dealt by the attack.)
flavor: "Do not be frightened by what you see. Be frightened by what you cannot see."
name: Aquinnah

text:
Fast. Play after a non-weakness, non-Elite enemy at your location is evaded.

Shuffle that enemy into the encounter deck.
name: Close Call

text:
Fast. Play when you would fail a skill test.

Get +2 to your skill value for that test. Draw 1 card.
name: Lucky!

text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.

Until the end of your turn, do not reveal chaos tokens for any skill tests you perform.
name: Will to Survive

text:
[action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack.

[action] Discard Knife: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage.
name: Knife

text:
Uses (3 supplies).

[action] Spend 1 supply: Investigate. Your location gets -2 shroud for this investigation.
name: Flashlight

text: Gain 3 resources.
flavor: You can never be too prepared.
name: Emergency Cache

text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.

If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
flavor: Stay back! I'll handle this.
name: Guts

text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.

If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
flavor: At last, I've found it!
name: Perception

text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.

If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
flavor: Die, you beast!
name: Overpower

text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.

If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
flavor: Too easy.
name: Manual Dexterity

text: Max 1 committed per skill test.
flavor: Sometimes, the most selfless acts can come from the strangest places
name: Unexpected Courage

flavor: Bullets are one thing... twelve-inch fangs quite another.
name: Bulletproof Vest

flavor: This has been in my family for generations. Take care of it, and it will take care of you.
name: Elder Sign Amulet

text: Revelation - Choose and discard all but 1 card from your hand.
flavor: Wait... where am I? What was I doing?
name: Amnesia

text: Revelation - Discard all your resources.
flavor: What was that noise?
name: Paranoia

text:
Revelation - Add Haunted to your threat area.

You get -1 to each of your skills.

[action][action]: Discard Haunted.
name: Haunted

text:
Revelation - Add Psychosis to your threat area.

Forced - After you take 1 or more horror: Take 1 direct damage.

[action][action]: Discard Psychosis.
name: Psychosis

text:
Revelation - Add Hypochondria to your threat area.

Forced - After you take 1 or more damage: Take 1 direct horror.

[action][action]: Discard Hypochondria.
